GameConditionDef.label: intense volcanic heat
GameConditionDef.description: Intense volcanic activity from a nearby volcano further increases the local temperature.

GameConditionDef.label: volcanic debris rain
GameConditionDef.description: Recent volcanic activity has launched large pieces of rock into the air. While the debris will rapidly cool, it will likely ignite anything nearby on impact. The debris can be mined for useful, and possibly quite rare, items.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: volcanic debris will begin falling in the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration]

GameConditionDef.label: volcanic miasma
GameConditionDef.description: Recent volcanic activity has opened up several caverns deep underground, releasing the miasma previously contained within. While outdoor plants will be fine, any animals caught outside will be forced to breathe in the toxic gases.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: dense volcanic miasma will blanket the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], killing outdoor animal life
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The miasma begins to dissipate. The air is breathable again.

GameConditionDef.label: volcanic earthquake
GameConditionDef.description: Recent volcanic activity has caused powerful tremors to occur. While it will likely be short lived, structures that can support roofs may take damage, and overhead mountain roofs may collapse.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: powerful volcanic tremors will be felt at [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration]
